attributes.action: Close universities and colleges, and move all lectures online
attributes.additional_details: I want to government to do this because, if we are at a stage where a national lockdown is required then we should all get the same message to stay at home. It's not fair for the government to put students at risk, especially when they are some of the main carriers of Covid-19.
attributes.background: I want the government to close universities and colleges as we can easily be facilitated online. It is not fair to put students, staff, families and loved ones at risk when we can be online.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Close all Schools and colleges and Universities during second lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557413

Force Universities to close commencing National Lockdown on November 5th 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558383

Require university campuses to close to stop the spread of COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552512
